Question: visionary.ai CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Visionary.ai

Product Highlight: Edge AI for Extreme Low-Light and HDR Video Capture

- Empowers cameras to capture video in extreme low light and HDR environments
- Utilizes edge AI for real-time software-based image processing to drastically improve video quality
- Applications include mobile, PC, smart doorbells, drones, robotics, and IoT
